scripts.init: mkdir -p resources/public/css/tolgraven; npm install; npm i -g sass postcss postcss-cli
scripts.sass:dev: bash -lc 'SASS_PATH=$(find resources/scss -type d | paste -sd: -); export SASS_PATH; sass resources/scss/main.scss:resources/public/css/tolgraven/main.css --watch --poll --embed-source-map --embed-sources'
scripts.sass:build: bash -lc 'SASS_PATH=$(find resources/scss -type d | paste -sd: -); export SASS_PATH; sass resources/scss/main.scss:resources/public/css/tolgraven/main.css --style=compressed --no-error-css'
scripts.build: npm run sass:build && npm run postcss:build
